title: Silk Presses & Natural Haircare | Beauty Arroganceâ€™s Nikki Wright Rudolph
description: Today Nikki Wright Rudolph is going to be talking to us about all kinds of things. She's been in the hair industry for 25+ years. She's the founder of Beauty Arrogance. She's a master multicultural stylist and the author of The Art of the Healthy Silk Press. And lastly, a true pioneer in the beauty industry.
